Components.title: Building faster websites.
Components.subtext: Critical simplicity is the antidote to useless complexity.

Features.title: Bring Your Own Framework
Features.description: Build your site using React, Svelte, Vue, Preact, web components, or just plain ol' HTML + JavaScript.

Features.title: 100% Static HTML, No JS
Features.description: Astro renders your entire page to static HTML, removing all JavaScript from your final build by default.

Features.title: On-Demand Components
Features.description: Need some JS? Astro can automatically hydrate interactive components when they become visible on the page.

Features.title: Broad Integration
Features.description: Astro supports TypeScript, Scoped CSS, CSS Modules, Sass, Tailwind, Markdown, MDX, and any other npm packages.

Features.title: SEO Enabled
Features.description: Automatic sitemaps, RSS feeds, pagination and collections take the pain out of SEO and syndication. It just works!

Features.title: Community
Features.description: Astro is an open source project powered by hundreds of contributors making thousands of individual contributions.
